channel.title: I Keep getting dced =(
channel.description: So my server works fine, no errors, everything is up and running, but when i log in it lets me log in for like half a second then dc's me right away?? why does this happen? this is what my run.bat says when i get dced [code]Starting Ultimate-PvP Loaded clipmap in 182ms. Loaded WorldMap In (154 ms)... [Ultimate-PvP ONLINE] Connection from c-24-21-70-11.hsd1.or.comcast.net:56378 [client-1-E bunny]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 4 ms] ClientHandler: Client E bunny disconnected (c-24-21-70-11.hsd1.or.comcast.net) [/code]

item.title: I Keep getting dced =(
item.dc:creator: @e_bunny e bunny
item.description:
@e_bunny wrote:

I switched clients now im getting this error =/

Starting Ultimate-PvP Loaded clipmap in 370ms. Loaded WorldMap In (161 ms)... [ForeverPkers ONLINE] Connection from 78.159.98.194:43056 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (78.159.98.194) Connection from 127.0.0.1:56784 [client-1-E bunny]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 5 ms] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from E bunny. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:22050) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:311) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client E bunny disconnected (127.0.0.1)

Read full topic
